items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #331 of Weekly Xamarin - a weekly overview of what happened this past week in the Xamarin and MAUI communities.

This week we are still going through recaps of .NET Conf, which is understandable given of all the amazing content. There are also some interesting community standups to catchup with.

It's December people! Where does the year go?

❤

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #331 of Weekly Xamarin - a weekly overview of what happened this past week in the Xamarin and MAUI communities.

This week we are still going through recaps of .NET Conf, which is understandable given of all the amazing content. There are also some interesting community standups to catchup with.

It's December people! Where does the year go?

❤

Kym

items.title: Catchup with all the latest happenings in .NET, C#, Xamarin, MAUI and Blazor
items.description:
This post is a good set of links for content to investigate for Xamarin, Blazor and Maui developers to catchup on all the happenings. For those of you who don’t want to sit through hours of videos, I have watched the sessions and linked the resources so you don’t have to.

.NET Conf recap by Kym Phillpotts

items.title: Monkey Conf 2021 Sessions
items.description:
Monkey Conf is a .NET related event, the biggest held in Spain. Even though the event is oriented to .NET, all the talks were about mobile: Xamarin and .NET MAUI. Most of the talks are in Spanish, but the content is great, so if you don't speak Spanish flick on those translations.

Monkey Conf 2021 by Monkey Conf
items.description_markdown:
Monkey Conf is a .NET related event, the biggest held in Spain. Even though the event is oriented to .NET, all the talks were about mobile: Xamarin and .NET MAUI. Most of the talks are in Spanish, but the content is great, so if you don't speak Spanish flick on those translations.

[**Monkey Conf 2021**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2d0FiNIDRPA) by [Monkey Conf](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCmLmBtMV2MlSCC-3fq0LUg)

items.title: .NET MAUI: Customize Controls with Handlers and Mappers
items.description:
Customizing controls has become a lot easier with .NET MAUI if we compare to Xamarin.Forms. No more custom renderers, just a few lines of code (either PrependToMapper, ModifyMapper or AppendToMapper) to our handlers and mappers and we're good to go. In this video I will show you the (updated) code on how to do just that and show you how we customize the Entry on Android to remove the underline.

.NET MAUI: Customize Controls with Handlers and Mappers by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Customizing controls has become a lot easier with .NET MAUI if we compare to Xamarin.Forms. No more custom renderers, just a few lines of code (either PrependToMapper, ModifyMapper or AppendToMapper) to our handlers and mappers and we're good to go. In this video I will show you the (updated) code on how to do just that and show you how we customize the Entry on Android to remove the underline.

[**.NET MAUI: Customize Controls with Handlers and Mappers**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k6Zk3Ho8YNw) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI: Customize Controls with Handlers and Mappers**

items.title: Merge Conflict: 282: Automating Protocols
items.description:
Custom schemes, http schemes, protocols, they are a pain to develop for, but are so powerful! After years of using them, we finally figured out how to automate it and we have a lot of ideas!

Merge Conflict: 282: Automating Protocols by Merge Conflict
items.description_markdown:
Custom schemes, http schemes, protocols, they are a pain to develop for, but are so powerful! After years of using them, we finally figured out how to automate it and we have a lot of ideas!

[**Merge Conflict: 282: Automating Protocols**](https://www.mergeconflict.fm/282) by [Merge Conflict](https://twitter.com/mergeconflictfm)
